originalLyrics:
Aya Nakamura, oh yeah
Hello papi, mais qué pasa? (Mais qué pasa?)
J'entends des bails atroces sur moi
À c'qu'il paraît, j'te cours après? (Oh yeah, yeah, yeah)
Mais ça va pas? mais t'es taré, oh ouais
Mais comment ça, le monde est tit-pe? (Eh)
Tu croyais quoi, qu'on s'verrait plus jamais?
J'pourrais t'afficher mais c'est pas mon délire
D'après les rumeurs, tu m'as eue dans ton lit
Oh, Djadja
Y a pas moyen, Djadja

texts.title: Réflexions Quotidiennes
text: J'entends des bruits dans la rue.
Est-ce que c'est ce que je croyais ?
Je pourrais sortir voir ce qui se passe.
On se verrait peut-être dehors.
Il faut que je puisse t'afficher mon soutien.

texts.title: Dans Mon Quartier
text: Tout le monde parle des rumeurs du quartier.
Je lis les bails sur mon lit le soir.
C'est un vrai délire cette histoire!

texts.title: Messages Sur Instagram
text: Ouais, comment tu vas aujourd'hui ?
Je ne veux plus jamais y aller.
Ce n'est pas comme avant.

texts.title: Commentaires En Ligne
text: Ces moments atroces me hantent encore.
Mon tit-pe frère est vraiment taré !

texts.title: Discussion Sur Snapchat
text: Mais des gens sur le réseau disent
À ce qu'il paraît, ça va pas.
T'es là ? Je te cours après partout !
Le message que tu cherches, c'est moi.

texts.title: Messages Entre Amis
text: Tu m'as eue, c'est mon erreur !
D'après quoi qu'on dit dans ton groupe,
Y a pas moyen de se voir dans la soirée ?

phrases.originalFrench: J'entends des bruits dans la rue.
Est-ce que c'est ce que je croyais ?
Je pourrais sortir voir ce qui se passe.
On se verrait peut-être dehors.
Il faut que je puisse t'afficher mon soutien.
Tout le monde parle des rumeurs du quartier.
Je lis les bails sur mon lit le soir.
C'est un vrai délire cette histoire!
Ouais, comment tu vas aujourd'hui ?
Je ne veux plus jamais y aller.
Ce n'est pas comme avant.
Ces moments atroces me hantent encore.
Mon tit-pe frère est vraiment taré !
Mais des gens sur le réseau disent
À ce qu'il paraît, ça va pas.
T'es là ? Je te cours après partout !
Le message que tu cherches, c'est moi.
Tu m'as eue, c'est mon erreur !
D'après ce qu'on dit dans ton groupe
Y a pas moyen de se voir dans la soirée ?

solutions.primaryTranslation: I hear noises in the street.
alternatives: I can hear sounds from the street.
distractors: I can hear the road.
I hear sounds from your road.
It's the noises on the street.

solutions.primaryTranslation: Is it what I thought?
alternatives: Could it be what I suspected?
Is this what I believed it was?
distractors: Should I believe that?
Is this what I was thinking?
Is it really what I thought it was?

solutions.primaryTranslation: I could go out and see what's happening.
alternatives: I might go check what's going on.
I could take a look at what's happening outside.
distractors: I can leave to look at whatever takes place.
I might leave and see what is happening.
I can go out and look at whatever happens.

solutions.primaryTranslation: Maybe we'll see each other outside.
alternatives: We might run into each other outside.
distractors: We could meet perhaps out there.
Possibly we would see each other out.
We'd run into each other someday.

solutions.primaryTranslation: I need to be able to show you my support.
alternatives: I must find a way to show you my support.
I have to demonstrate my support for you.
distractors: It is necessary that I may display to you my backing.
I have to express to you my encouragement.
I need to demonstrate my solidarity to them.

solutions.primaryTranslation: Everyone is talking about the neighborhood gossip.
alternatives: The whole neighborhood is buzzing with rumors.
distractors: All the world speaks of the rumors of the quarter.
The whole world discusses the hearsay from the area.
All people are speaking of the talk around the quarter.

solutions.primaryTranslation: I read the gossip in bed at night.
alternatives: I check out the latest news from my bed at night.
I read about what's going on while in bed at night.
distractors: I peruse the news atop my bedding at evening.
I read the things  in bed every night.
I am reading stuff over my bed in the evenings.

solutions.primaryTranslation: This story is totally crazy!
distractors: It is a true delirium this thing!
That is completely insane!
This is absolutely wild!

solutions.primaryTranslation: Yeah, how are you today?
distractors: Yep, what way you're going this day?
Yes, how's you feel now?
Yeah, how are you feeling?

solutions.primaryTranslation: I never want to go there again.
alternatives: I don't ever want to go back there.
distractors: I do not wish anymore to go to it.
I refuse any longer to visit there.
I want to go there again.

solutions.primaryTranslation: It's not like it used to be.
alternatives: Things aren't like they were before.
distractors: This isn't as before.
This is not like it was.
That isn't the way it was in the past.

solutions.primaryTranslation: Those terrible moments still haunt me.
alternatives: I'm still haunted by those awful moments.
Those horrific times continue to haunt me.
distractors: These atrocious moments persist in my mind yet.
Those dreadful times continue to plague me.
The awful moments haunt to me still.

solutions.primaryTranslation: My little brother is totally crazy!
alternatives: My little bro is completely nuts!
My kid brother is absolutely insane!
distractors: My younger brother has become absolutely insane!
My bro turns out to be really messed up!
My younger brother becomes really nuts!

solutions.primaryTranslation: But people on the network are saying
alternatives: But people on social media are saying
distractors: However persons via social media tell
Though some people across the internet claim
But some people tell across internet

solutions.primaryTranslation: Apparently, things aren't going well.
distractors: It seems, it's not okay.
From what I hear, something is off.
It appears that it's not going.

solutions.primaryTranslation: Are you there? I've been looking everywhere for you!
alternatives: Where are you? I've been chasing after you everywhere!
You there? I've been searching all over for you!
distractors: Art thou there? I am running after you all over!
You're here? I'm pursuing you in every place!
You are around? I run behind you everywhere!

solutions.primaryTranslation: I'm the message you're looking for.
alternatives: The message you seek is me.
You're looking for this message - it's me.
distractors: The note which you seek, it's myself.
The message what you want, that's me.
The message which you seek is myself.

solutions.primaryTranslation: You got me, it's my mistake!
alternatives: You fooled me, that's on me!
distractors: You had me, that's my error!
You fooled me, this is my blunder!
You tricked me, it was my fault!

solutions.primaryTranslation: According to what people are saying in your group
alternatives: From what they're saying in your group
Based on the talk in your group
distractors: Based on that which they say inside your circle
From what one says among your team
According to the things that say in your group

solutions.primaryTranslation: Is there any chance we could meet up tonight?
alternatives: Any way we could get together this evening?
Could we possibly meet later today?
distractors: There isn't means to see each other in the evening?
Isn't there some way to get together throughout the night?
Isn't there possibility to view ourselves in the evening?
